Participants rheumatoid arthritis receive 6 dos infliximab 3 milligram per kilogram ( mg/kg ) intravenous infusion ( fluid medicine deliver vein way needle ) Week 0 , 2 , 6 observe 30 week ; ankylose spondylitis , psoriasis psoriatic arthritis also receive 6 dos injection observe 24 30 week . Efficacy evaluate Bath Ankylosing Spondylitis Disease Activity Index ( BASDAI ) , Erythrocyte Sedimentation Rate ( ESR ) , C-reactive protein ( CRP ) , Psoriasis Area Severity Index ( PASI ) , swollen joint count tender joint count .
